input_args.passage: 'Carl Wieland - Wikipedia | Carl Wieland (born 1950) is an Australian young earth creationist, author and speaker. He was the managing director of Creation Ministries International (formerly Answers in Genesis - Australia), a Creationist apologetics ministry., Australian young earth creationist, author and speaker\nCarl Wieland - Wikipedia | Dr. Carl Wieland (born 1950) is an Australian young earth creationist, author and speaker. He was the managing director of Creation Ministries International (formerly Answers in Genesis - Australia), a Creationist apologetics ministry. CMI are the distributors of Creation magazine and the Journal of Creation., Creation Ministries International'
input_args.claim: 'Carl Wieland has been described as a young earth creationist and was the managing director of Creation Ministries International, a creationist apologetics ministry.'
